contents.subTitle: Front-end
contents.text: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, React Native, Next, Redux, HTML, CSS, Sass, Styled Components.

contents.subTitle: Back-end
contents.text: Node, Docker, Knex, Sequelize, Prisma, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Nodemailer, AWS, Socket.io, Jest, Linux.

about.title: Prepared for an endless learning journey, passionate about technology, programming and especially, evolution and daily growth.

title: OpinaHub
Evaluations and feedback system
texts: Back-end development with Prisma ORM and front-end with React;

title: Medfy
System for searching and filtering doctors
texts: Back-end development with  the query builder knex (using postgres as database);
File upload with multer and S3 from AWS;
Front-end resources development (with Next), complex components creation, such as dynamic lists and drag and drops.

title: Akmos
Fitness App
texts: Back-end development with sequelize and web sockets use to create a chat;
Built interfaces and helped integrate the mobile app with the api;

title: ICTS
Sistema de análise de risco de contratação
texts: Built multiple charts using the Apexcharts library;
Helped integrating the front-end with the api;
Was responsible for the site responsiveness.
